info.title: Client-Server Module Handler Protocol
info.description: The most valuable and basic protocol for loading dynamic content. It's based on AJAX content loading and defines the controllers for those interactions.

method.name: addAction
method.description: Adds a custom action to a DOMElement.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The item to receive the action.

parameter.name: $dataName
parameter.description: The name of the data attribute.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to set as action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If empty, get the module's default view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An associative array as a number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request (attrName => attrValue).

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: If true, set the page loading indicator. False by default.

method.name: addAsync
method.description: Adds async handler to container. This enables the protocol to load the content asynchronously when the holder enters the DOM.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The element to receive the handler

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to load.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If empty, get the module's default view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The DOM holder/receiver where the content will go. It's a CSS selector.

parameter.name: $startup
parameter.description: Whether this action will be triggered when on next content.modified.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An associative array as a number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request (attrName => attrValue).

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: Set the page loading indicator.

method.name: addActionGET
method.description: Inserts a module handler to a DOMElement. It interacts with the server (GET Request Method) and gets content.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The item to receive the handler

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to be loaded.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If empty, get the module's default view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The CSS selector of the object that will receive the content from the server

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An associative array as a number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request (attrName => attrValue).

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: Set the page loading indicator.

method.name: addActionPOST
method.description: Inserts a module handler to a DOMElement. It interacts with the server (POST Request Method) and gets the answer.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The item to receive the handler

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The CSS selector of the object that will receive the content from the server

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request.

method.deprecated: This method is deprecated. For posting data you should use forms.

method.name: addAsyncATTR
method.description: Inserts a number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The item to receive the attributes.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An associative array as a number of attributes to be sent to the server along with the request (attrName => attrValue).

method.name: getAction
method.description: It creates and returns an action array indicating the action that will be committed upon request.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to load.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If empty, get the module's default view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The CSS selector of the object that will receive the content from the server

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: Set the page loading indicator.

method.name: addActionReady
method.description: Inserts directly the action array that was generated by the "getAction" method to the item.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The item to receive the action

parameter.name: $action
parameter.description: The action array

method.deprecated: This function is deprecated. You should use an action ready function.
